metadata.title: Unlimited HEIC to JPG Converter: 100% Private Local Batch Processing | Toolaze
metadata.description: Convert HEIC/HEIF images to JPG format instantly. Unlimited file sizes, batch process up to 100 images. 100% private, local processing. No uploads, no waiting—professional performance directly on your device.

hero.h1: Unlimited HEIC to JPG Converter: 100% Private Local Batch Processing
hero.desc: Stop struggling with Apple's proprietary format. Toolaze provides the most powerful, browser-based solution to transform your HEIC photos into high-quality JPG files instantly. Enjoy the freedom of unlimited file sizes and process up to 100 images in a single batch. No uploads, no waiting—just professional performance directly on your device.

intro.title: Your Sensitive Metadata Stays Under Your Control
intro.content:
Most online converters pose a silent threat to your privacy by uploading your photos—and their embedded GPS data—to remote servers. Toolaze is different. By utilizing advanced client-side technology, every byte of your HEIC to JPG conversion happens locally in your browser. We don't just protect your images; we protect your identity. Your photos, your location data, and your memories never leave your hard drive.

While HEIC (High Efficiency Image Format) is excellent for saving storage space on your iPhone, it remains a major headache for Windows users, legacy web platforms, and professional editing software. Toolaze bridges this gap. Our engine translates Apple's advanced HEVC encoding into the universally accepted JPG format without sacrificing visual fidelity. By optimizing this process locally, we eliminate the 2026 digital friction of "unsupported file" errors, ensuring your high-res photography is ready for sharing, printing, or professional web deployment immediately.

specs.engine: HEVC Decoder Active - Local GPU Acceleration
specs.logic: Full EXIF Preservation (GPS, Date, Device tags)

metrics.label: EXIF Support
metrics.value: Full preservation of GPS, Date, and Device tags

howToUse.title: Convert 100 HEIC Files in 3 Simple Steps

steps.title: Select Your Assets
steps.desc: Drag up to 100 HEIC images into the Toolaze workspace. Remember, we have no individual file size limits.

steps.title: Verify Settings
steps.desc: Our AI engine automatically maps the HEVC data to high-quality JPG profiles while preserving your original EXIF metadata (GPS, date, and camera info).

steps.title: Instant Save
steps.desc: Since the conversion is 100% local, your JPGs are ready for download the moment the processing bar finishes—no server queues, no download delays.

comparison.toolaze: Unlimited file sizes, Batch 100+ images, 100% local processing, Full EXIF preservation, No uploads, Free forever
comparison.others: 20MB file limits, 10 conversions per day, Cloud uploads required, EXIF data stripped, Server queues, Paid upgrades

scenes.desc: Quickly backup your entire HEIC library to JPG for easy viewing on Windows PCs or smart TVs.

scenes.title: Social Media Managers
scenes.desc: Transform HEIC assets into optimized JPG formats for instant upload to platforms that don't yet support Apple's new standards.

scenes.desc: Share large 50MB+ high-fidelity renders or photos as lightweight JPG attachments without crashing your email client.

rating.text: "Finally, a tool that respects my privacy and handles my 100-photo batches without a hitch." - Join 10,000+ developers and photographers who have made Toolaze their primary lab for secure, unlimited image optimization.

faq.q: Will I lose my photo's GPS and time information?
faq.a: No. Toolaze is designed to be a professional-grade tool. We preserve all EXIF metadata, ensuring your JPG exports keep the original shooting date, camera settings, and location tags.

faq.q: Can I really convert a 200MB HEIC file?
faq.a: Yes. Unlike competitors who have strict bandwidth limits, Toolaze has no file size restrictions. If your computer has the RAM to open it, Toolaze can convert it.
Speed and security. By processing data on your device, we skip the slow "Upload" and "Download" phases. It's the fastest and most secure way to handle image data in 2026.

compare.toolaze: Unlimited HEIC to JPG conversion, Local-first architecture, No file size limits, Full EXIF preservation, 100% private processing
compare.others: 20MB file limits, Cloud uploads required, Server queues, EXIF data stripped, Privacy concerns
